greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A shell model of partitions. Triangle read by rows: row n lists the parts of the last section of the set of partitions of n.
comment: Row n lists the terms of row n of A138138, in decreasing order. See the integrated diagram of partitions and more information in the entry A138138.
link: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4630, 20 rows.
mathematica: Table[Cases[IntegerPartitions[n], x_ /; Last[x] != 1] ~Join~ConstantArray[{1}, PartitionsP[n - 1]], {n, 8}] // Flatten (* _Robert Price_, May 22 2020 *)
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Mar 21 2008
